resources.string: Rules of the game: there will be three figures in front of you, two at the bottom and one at the top, in two of them there will be numbers. It is necessary that the sum of the numbers from the two lower figures be equal to the number in the upper figure, for this you need to insert the missing number.\n\nExample: in the upper circle there is the number 7, in one of the lower ones there is a question mark, and in the other there is a number (therefore, in place of the question mark there should be the number 3, because 3 + 4 = 7
